00036 
00037 ostream* os_ = 0;
00038 
00039 
00040 string filenameBase_ = "temp.MSDataFileTest";
00041 
00042 
00043 void validateWriteRead(const MSDataFile::WriteConfig& writeConfig,
00044                        const DiffConfig diffConfig)
00045 {
00046     if (os_) *os_ << "validateWriteRead()\n  " << writeConfig << endl; 
00047 
00048     // create MSData object in memory
00049 
00050     MSData tiny;
00051     examples::initializeTiny(tiny);
00052 
00053     // write to file #1 (static)
00054 
00055     string filename1 = filenameBase_ + ".1";
00056     MSDataFile::write(tiny, filename1, writeConfig);
00057 
00058     // read back into an MSDataFile object
00059 
00060     MSDataFile msd1(filename1);
00061 
00062     // compare
00063 
00064     Diff<MSData> diff(tiny, msd1, diffConfig);
00065     if (diff && os_) *os_ << diff << endl;
00066     unit_assert(!diff);
00067 
00068     // write to file #2 (member)
00069 
00070     string filename2 = filenameBase_ + ".2";
00071     msd1.write(filename2, writeConfig);
00072 
00073     // read back into another MSDataFile object
00074 
00075     MSDataFile msd2(filename2);
00076 
00077     // compare
00078 
00079     diff(tiny, msd2);
00080     if (diff && os_) *os_ << diff << endl;
00081     unit_assert(!diff);
00082 
00083     // remove temp files
00084 
00085     system(("rm " + filename1 + " " + filename2).c_str());
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 void test()
00090 {
00091     MSDataFile::WriteConfig writeConfig;
00092     DiffConfig diffConfig;
00093 
00094     // mzML 64-bit, full diff
00095     validateWriteRead(writeConfig, diffConfig);
00096 
00097     writeConfig.indexed = false;
00098     validateWriteRead(writeConfig, diffConfig); // no index
00099     writeConfig.indexed = true;
00100 
00101     // mzML 32-bit, full diff
00102     writeConfig.binaryDataEncoderConfig.precision = BinaryDataEncoder::Precision_32;
00103     validateWriteRead(writeConfig, diffConfig);
00104 
00105     // mzXML 32-bit, diff ignoring metadata
00106     writeConfig.format = MSDataFile::Format_mzXML;
00107     diffConfig.ignoreMetadata = true;
00108     validateWriteRead(writeConfig, diffConfig);
00109 
00110     // mzXML 64-bit, diff ignoring metadata 
00111     writeConfig.binaryDataEncoderConfig.precision = BinaryDataEncoder::Precision_64;
00112     validateWriteRead(writeConfig, diffConfig);
00113 
00114     writeConfig.indexed = false;
00115     validateWriteRead(writeConfig, diffConfig); // no index
00116     writeConfig.indexed = true;
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 void demo()
00121 {
00122     MSData tiny;
00123     examples::initializeTiny(tiny);
00124 
00125     MSDataFile::WriteConfig config;
00126     MSDataFile::write(tiny, filenameBase_ + ".64.mzML", config);
00127 
00128     config.binaryDataEncoderConfig.precision = BinaryDataEncoder::Precision_32;
00129     MSDataFile::write(tiny, filenameBase_ + ".32.mzML", config);
00130 
00131     config.format = MSDataFile::Format_Text;
00132     MSDataFile::write(tiny, filenameBase_ + ".txt", config);
00133 
00134     config.format = MSDataFile::Format_mzXML;
00135     MSDataFile::write(tiny, filenameBase_ + ".32.mzXML", config);
00136 
00137     config.binaryDataEncoderConfig.precision = BinaryDataEncoder::Precision_64;
00138     MSDataFile::write(tiny, filenameBase_ + ".64.mzXML", config);
00139 }

00141 
00142 const char rawHeader_[] = {'\x01', '\xA1', 
00143     'F', '\0', 'i', '\0', 'n', '\0', 'n', '\0', 
00144     'i', '\0', 'g', '\0', 'a', '\0', 'n', '\0'};
00145 
00146 
00147 class TestReader : public Reader
00148 {
00149     public:
00150 
00151     TestReader() : count(0) {}
00152 
00153     virtual bool accept(const std::string& filename, const std::string& head) const
00154     {
00155         if (filename.size()<=4 || filename.substr(filename.size()-4)!=".RAW")
00156             return false;
00157 
00158         for (size_t i=0; i<sizeof(rawHeader_); i++)
00159             if (head[i] != rawHeader_[i]) 
00160                 return false;
00161 
00162         count++;
00163         return true;
00164     }
00165 
00166     virtual void read(const std::string& filename, const std::string& head, MSData& result) const
00167     {
00168         count++;
00169     }
00170 
00171     mutable int count;
00172 };
00173 
00174 
00175 void testReader()
00176 {
00177     // create a file
00178     string filename = filenameBase_ + ".RAW";
00179     ofstream os(filename.c_str());
00180     os.write(rawHeader_, 18);
00181     os.close();
00182 
00183     // open the file with our Reader
00184     TestReader reader;
00185     MSDataFile msd(filename, &reader);
00186 
00187     // verify that our reader got called properly
00188     unit_assert(reader.count == 2);
00189 
00190     // remove temp file
00191     system(("rm " + filename).c_str());
00192 }
00193 
00194 
00195 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00196 {
00197     try
00198     {
00199         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00200         test();
00201         //demo();
00202         testReader();
00203         return 0;
00204     }
00205     catch (exception& e)
00206     {
00207         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00208     }
00209     catch (...)
00210     {
00211         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00212     }
00213     
00214     return 1;
00215 }
